scripts.build:jsx: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -d -e src/app.jsx -o dist/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties ] ]
scripts.build:js: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -d -e src/vanilla.js -o dist/vanilla.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties ] ]
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:jsx && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && npm run build:scripts && npm run copy:html
